#summary Brighteriffic

= Brighteriffic =

This application creates a Home shortcut that lets you toggle the global screen brightness. Work for both Android 1.1 and 1.5 (a.k.a. Cupcake).

You can find it on Market.

Source is available here: http://code.google.com/p/autosettings/source/browse/#svn/trunk/Brighteriffic
